name: EOTF
description:
An puzzle game/walking simulator constructed using unreal engine.

The current build comprises of the first level, the completion time of which is not fixed and depends solely on the, dare I say, luck of the player.

Those who wish to support the game and/or receive prior news regarding future releases with early access to private test versions can do so using the following patreon link:

https://www.patreon.com/xerein
